subject: Hockey, Ice
Amateur Athletics
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: There is no professional women’s hockey league comparable to the N.H.L., despite the sport’s rising status, but a five-year-old amateur Canadian league provides a home for elite players.
snippet: There is no professional women’s hockey league comparable to the N.H.L., despite the sport’s rising status, but a five-year-old amateur Canadian league provides a home for elite players.
